headline: Tap. Earn Rewards. Repeat. The New T-Mobile Visa Credit Card is Here
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., November 04, 2025--Today, in a video announcement, T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) and Capital One (NYSE: COF) introduced T-Mobile Visa®, the only credit card that gives customers even more value from the Un-carrier. T-Mobile Visa turns every purchase into T-Mobile Rewards that cardholders can use toward new phones, accessories and even their T-Mobile bill.
